subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: The league’s proposal calls for a 50-50 split of revenue, combined with extensive new restrictions on free agency and team payrolls, and union officials have until Wednesday afternoon to accept.
snippet: The league’s proposal calls for a 50-50 split of revenue, combined with extensive new restrictions on free agency and team payrolls, and union officials have until Wednesday afternoon to accept.
